RestConnector.Title: Campaigns List
RestConnector.HelpText: Get all campaigns in an account.

Text.Title: Filter by List Id
Text.HelpText: Leave Empty to include all Lists

Fetch.Fetch.Url: @(Model.Base)/3.0/campaigns? @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.ListId) ? "&list_id=" + Model.ListId : "") @if(Model.SentInterval.StartDate != null && Model.SentInterval.EndDate != null) { @: &since_send_time=@Model.SentInterval.StartDate.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd")T00:00:00+00:00 @: &before_send_time=@Model.SentInterval.EndDate.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd")T00:00:00+00:00 } @(Model.Status != "all" ? "status=" + Model.Status : "") @(Model.Type != "all" ? "type=" + Model.Type : "") &sort_field=send_time &sort_dir=@(Model.Sorting) &count=@(Model.PageCursor.NextTake) &offset=@(Model.PageCursor.NextSkip)
